body.name: Dr. Brite Natural Whitening Vitamin C Mouthwash with Mint and Activated Coconut Charcoal (16 Fl Oz) (Pack of 2)
body.stockDetail: Only 18 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 18 hrs 35 mins.
features: NATURAL WHITENING MOUTHWASH: Coconut activated charcoal gives your mouth a clean, healthy detox while naturally whitening teeth.
FRESH BREATH FOR HOURS: Refreshing mint flavor soothes and nourishes gums with a cool, exhilarating rinse that gives you hours of bad breath relief with no burn.

CLEAN, SAFE INGREDIENTS: Our alcohol free formula uses the cleanest natural ingredients possible and is cruelty free, gluten free, paraben free, non-GMO, phthalate free and sulfate free. It is so clean that it is 100% edible and safe to swallow!
GREAT TASTING DRY MOUTH RELIEF: Our natural ingredients like organic coconut oil and aloe vera help prevent dryness, leaving your mouth feeling nourished, not stinging or dry.

DENTIST RECOMMENDED: Formulated by doctors, recommended by dentists, and made in the USA of Domestic & Imported Materials, our oral rinse is ADA approved and freshens breath, eliminates germs, helps prevent cavities, and aids in gum health.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Have you ever wondered why using mouthwash is really important? Even those most dedicated to maintaining their oral and dental health can harbor around 1,000 to 100,000 bacteria on every tooth surface, surprising fact! You may not be able to remove all the plaque and bacteria by just brushing and flossing- here comes mouthwash. It reaches all of the surfaces and crevices of your teeth while helping to remove all the bad particles from your mouth. Now if we say that Dr. Brite Cleaning Mouth Wash is completely organic, toxin-free and delicious- bingo! An urge to completely go for organic oral care products that heals, nourishes, and nurtures smiles of all sizes is the single motto retained by Dr. Brite. It all started when co-founder and breast cancer surgeon, Dr. Paris Sabo, MD who was shocked to see that her toddler is eating toothpaste full of harmful chemicals so Dr. Sabo teamed up with sister, fellow mom and veteran dentist, Dr. Pooneh Ramezani, DDS to give us Dr. Brite. Dr. Brite presents Cleansing Mouth Rinse coming in 3 flavors: Coco Chai, Mint and Strawberry. All the flavors contain coconut oil that gently removes impurities and keeps cavity-causing plaque at bay; Aloe Vera juice that nourishes, disinfects and moisturizes while helping to fight gum disease and freshen breath; and Vitamin C that helps boost gum health- can’t ask for more. All the flavors are refreshing, delicious, and promote healthy gums so choose your favorite one now.

Revive those Features Your Gums are Safe All the flavors support better gum health as they nourish delicate mouth tissues preventing bacteria growth, so spray away cavities with safe to swallow mouth wash- no one can stop you from smiling. Goodbye to Bad Breath Say goodbye to bad breath as Dr. Brite Cleaning Mouth Rinse neutralizes bad odors caused by bacteria, certain foods, and dry mouth so enjoy the long-lasting freshness at all times. White Teeth. Bright You Dr. Brite Cleaning Mouth Rinse contains white activated charcoal and coconut oil that gently whitens teeth without darkening your gums; it even detoxifies your mouth by absorbing toxins- great reason to indulge in its freshness

Refreshing Flavors to Choose Dr. Brite Cleaning Mouth Rinse comes in 3 delicious flavors, so let’s look at them more closely so you know where to start: Coco Chai: Indulge in the comfort of ancient Aurvedic benefits of oil pulling without the time commitment and risk giving a clean refreshing feeling of contentmentMint: A great tasting mouthwash with Spearmint Leaf Extract resulting in cool minty fresh breath, a clean feeling with taste; don’t forget the teeth and gum careWildberry: Immerse your palette in field of wild berries; the bold, fruity flavors of raspberries and strawberries deliver a delicious and freshest breath feeling ever

Ingredients- The Nourishing Way You must be wondering what makes these ingredients so nourishing, let’s see each flavor and explore: Coco Chai: Get benefits of Coconut oil, cinnamon, cardamom and vanilla to give a taste of sophistication and fresh feeling with pure nourishmentMint: Main components are Coconut Oil that gently remove impurity; Aloe Vera juice responsible for nourishing, disinfecting and moisturizing with freshness; and Vitamin C to boost gum healthWildberry: The major component is antioxidant and non-acidic vitamin C that supports gum health and healing while coconut oil gently nourish to help prevent dryness

Directions- Let’s start The most important part is to know how to use the mouth wash for better results, lets see below: Shake well prior to usePlace a small amount (15ml/3 teaspoons) of mouthwash in mouthSwish thoroughly for 30 secondsGargle and spit

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My family’s favorite mouthwash. I was looking for a clean mouthwash for my kids, with no fluoride, when I found Dr Brite. We have all been using it for a long time and it’s still a favorite in my household. With the fresh mint flavor and non-toxic ingredients, it’s a great choice for anyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Brought this product because it had clean ingredients. Did like the taste but gave it a chance ended liking it . Great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good taste, clean ingredients
reviews.reviewText: Tastes pretty good for a mouthwash. I like the clean ingredient list. A little pricey.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great clean flavor
reviews.reviewText: I like it and much better and more natural than some of the harsh chemicals alternatives.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Minty, fresh breath
reviews.reviewText: I’ve finally found a natural alternative to mouth wash, that works and is tolerable. the mint scent and flavour is strong but not overwhelming, only need a little bit of it. Feels good to wake up with a fresher breath than before, i brush my teeth also at night and I noticed with using this I wake up with no bad breath! Compared to before. No complaints, other than maybe the price point. But with natural products that’s just how it is, still would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is so much better than having alcohol in mouth wash. My breath smells nice and fresh and it doesn’t burn your mouth while doing it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars really really enjoy this ewg approved mouthwash (much better than the previous one i tried)
reviews.reviewText: very pleasant tastevery pleasant experience in the mouth (doesn't burn)allows me to gargle longer and more thoroughly due to the lack of burn (unlike most mouthwashes).will go fast as the containers arne't huge and very easy (without the burn) to use more than normal.Seems to do a good job- albeit maybe isn't perceived that way without the extreme burn.Very enjoyable expeirence- as well as responsible product. Can't lose with that combination.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars NO FLOURIDE - NO ALCOHOL
reviews.reviewText: The primary components are COCONUT OIL, ALOE VERA & VITAMIN C. Coconut oil fights cavity-causing plaque. Aloe vera helps to fight gum disease. Vitamin C helps to prevent the growth of bacteria. Activated charcoal whitens teeth. Spearmint leaf extract freshens breath. ALL OF THE INGREDIENTS ARE NATURAL. No artificial flavors, colors or sweeteners are used.

Lo compre relación cantidad - precio y por sus características: "3 pack- 16 Oz bottle" 473ml aprox. pero en cambio la foto, hay que fijarse bien, pone en el bote que es de 8 Oz que equivale a 247ml aprox. y si, viene así.Asi que pasa a la mitad... He tenido que devolverlo... Se agradeceria que corrigierais la información aunque sea para otros compradores, para que no se encuentren con la misma situación.En relación al enjuague no lo he provado asi que no puedo opinar. Lo siento. Gracias.
